verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> certain men <S%G5100><s%> came down <S%G2718><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, saying <S%G3754><s%>, Except1437, 3361 ye be circumcised <S%G4059><s%> after the custom <S%G1485><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%>, ye <S%G1410><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G1410><s%> saved <S%G4982><s%>.

And <S%G3767><s%> when Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> had <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> small <S%G3641><s%> dissension <S%G4714><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> questioning <S%G4803><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, the brethren appointed that <S%G5021><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G243><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, should go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> question <S%G2213><s%>.

They therefore <S%G3767><s%>, <S%G3303><s%> being brought on their way <S%G4311><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>, passed through <S%G1330><s%> both Phoenicia <S%G5403><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%>, declaring <S%G1555><s%> the conversion <S%G1995><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they caused <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they were come <S%G3854><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, they were received <S%G588><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> they rehearsed <S%G312><s%> all things that <S%G3745><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> there rose up <S%G1817><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the sect <S%G139><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> who <S%G3754><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, It is needful to <S%G1163><s%> circumcise <S%G4059><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> to charge them to keep <S%G5083><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> were gathered together <S%G4863><s%> to consider <S%G1492><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> matter <S%G3056><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when there had been <S%G1096><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> questioning <S%G4803><s%>, Peter <S%G4074><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, <S%G435><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> know <S%G1987><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> a good <S%G575><s%> while <S%G2250><s%> ago <S%G744><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made choice <S%G1586><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G2254><s%>, that by <S%G1223><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> should hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who knoweth the heart <S%G2589><s%>, bare <S%G3140><s%> them <S%G846><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%>, giving <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he did unto us <S%G2254><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G1252><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> distinction <S%G1252><s%> between3342, Deuteronomy37 us <S%G2257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, cleansing <S%G2511><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%>.

Now <S%G3568><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> make ye <S%G3985><s%> trial of God <S%G2316><s%>, that ye should put <S%G2007><s%> a yoke <S%G2218><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the neck <S%G5137><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> were able <S%G2480><s%> to bear <S%G941><s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> we believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, <S%G5547><s%> in like manner <S%G5158><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> they <S%G2548><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> kept silence <S%G4601><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they hearkened <S%G191><s%> unto Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> rehearsing <S%G1834><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> had wrought <S%G4160><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> they had held <S%G4601><s%> their <S%G846><s%> peace <S%G4601><s%>, James <S%G2385><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, <S%G435><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%>, hearken <S%G191><s%> unto me <S%G3450><s%>:

Symeon <S%G4826><s%> hath rehearsed <S%G1834><s%> how <S%G2531><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> visited <S%G1980><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, to take <S%G2983><s%> out of them <S%G1537><s%> a people <S%G2992><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> agree <S%G4856><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%>; as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>,

After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I will return <S%G390><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> I will build again <S%G456><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is fallen <S%G4098><s%>; And <S%G2532><s%> I will build again <S%G456><s%> the ruins <S%G2679><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> I will set <S%G461><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up <S%G461><s%>:

That <S%G3704><s%> the residue <S%G2645><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> may seek <S%G1567><s%> after the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, upon <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> is called <S%G1909><s%>,
Saith the Lord <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G846><s%> maketh <S%G2076><s%> these <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G2041><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> from <S%G575><s%> of old <S%G165><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> my <S%G1473><s%> judgment is <S%G2919><s%>, that we trouble <S%G3926><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> from among <S%G575><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> that we write <S%G1989><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, that they abstain <S%G567><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the pollutions <S%G234><s%> of idols <S%G1497><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from fornication <S%G4202><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from what is strangled <S%G4156><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from blood <S%G129><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> from generations <S%G1074><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> old <S%G744><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that preach <S%G2784><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, being read <S%G314><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> sabbath <S%G2596><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> it <S%G1380><s%> seemed good to the apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> church <S%G1577><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> choose <S%G1586><s%> men <S%G435><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> their company <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> them to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>; namely <S%G2455><s%>, Judas called Barsabbas <S%G2532><s%>, and Silas <S%G4609><s%>, chief <S%G2233><s%> men <S%G435><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>:

and they wrote <S%G1125><s%> thus <S%G3592><s%> by1223, 5495 them <S%G846><s%>, The apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, unto the brethren <S%G80><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are of <S%G1537><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Syria <S%G4947><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cilicia <S%G2791><s%>, greeting <S%G5463><s%>:

Forasmuch as <S%G1894><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> who went out <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> have troubled <S%G5015><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with words <S%G3056><s%>, subverting <S%G384><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>; to whom <S%G3739><s%> we gave <S%G1291><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> commandment <S%G1291><s%>;

it seemed good <S%G1380><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>, having come <S%G1096><s%> to one accord <S%G3661><s%>, to choose <S%G1586><s%> out men <S%G435><s%> and send <S%G3992><s%> them unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>,

men <S%G444><s%> that have hazarded <S%G3860><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lives <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

We have sent <S%G649><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%>, who <S%G846><s%> themselves also <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G518><s%> tell <S%G518><s%> you the same things <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> word of mouth <S%G3056><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it seemed good <S%G1380><s%> to the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%>, to lay upon <S%G2007><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> greater <S%G4119><s%> burden <S%G922><s%> than <S%G4133><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> necessary <S%G1876><s%> things <S%G5130><s%>:

that ye abstain <S%G567><s%> from things sacrificed to idols <S%G1494><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from blood <S%G129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from things strangled <S%G4156><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from fornication <S%G4202><s%>; from <S%G1537><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> if ye keep <S%G1301><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, it shall be <S%G4238><s%> well <S%G2095><s%> with you <S%G4517><s%>. Fare ye well.

So <S%G3767><s%> they <S%G3303><s%>, when they were dismissed <S%G630><s%>, came <S%G2064><s%> down to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> having gathered <S%G4863><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> together <S%G4863><s%>, they delivered <S%G1929><s%> the epistle <S%G1992><s%>.
And when <S%G1161><s%> they had read <S%G314><s%> it <S%G5463><s%>, they rejoiced for <S%G1909><s%> the consolation <S%G3874><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%>, exhorted <S%G3870><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> confirmed them <S%G1991><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> after they had spent some time <S%G4160><s%> there <S%G5550><s%>, they were dismissed <S%G630><s%> in <S%G3326><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> those that had sent them forth <S%G652><s%>.

But Paul3972, 1161 and <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> tarried <S%G1304><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> others <S%G2087><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>, Let us return <S%G1994><s%> now and <S%G1211><s%> visit <S%G1980><s%> the <S%G2257><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> city4172, 1722 wherein <S%G3739><s%> we proclaimed <S%G2605><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and see how <S%G4459><s%> they fare <S%G2192><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> was minded <S%G1011><s%> to take with them <S%G4838><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2564><s%>, who was called Mark <S%G3138><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> thought <S%G515><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> good <S%G515><s%> to take with them <S%G5126><s%> him <S%G4838><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> withdrew <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Pamphylia <S%G3828><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G4905><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> with them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G3767><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a sharp contention <S%G3948><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> they parted asunder <S%G673><s%> one <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the other <S%G240><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> Mark <S%G3138><s%> with him <S%G1602><s%>, and sailed away unto <S%G1519><s%> Cyprus <S%G2954><s%>;

but Paul <S%G3972><s%> choose <S%G1951><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%>, being commended <S%G3860><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2316><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he went through <S%G1330><s%> Syria <S%G4947><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cilicia <S%G2791><s%>, confirming <S%G1991><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%>.
